definition: to accept without question/to take sth at face value
according to/in accordance with/to shine/to illuminate/to reflect/to look at (one's reflection)/to take (a photo)/photo/as requested/as before
to receive/to accept/to collect/to put away/to restrain/to stop/in care of (used on address line after name)

sentences.english: He is all are welcome to shine on all of the lists to accept, several turn down start to be slanting pouring.
sentences.chinese: 他来者不拒照单全收，几圈下来开始歪歪倒倒。

sentences.english: Please don't accept Internet public opinion without question.
sentences.chinese: 请不要对网上的观点照单全收。

sentences.english: Many accept TV hook, line, and sinker.
sentences.chinese: 许多人对电视的内容照单全收。

sentences.english: It turns out that that answer is all three.
sentences.chinese: 答案看起来是三样照单全收。

sentences.english: You know it’s never-ending, and you don’t try to process it all.
sentences.chinese: 你知道它是不会停下来的，你也不会试图照单全收。

definition: to pay no heed to (idiom)/to ignore/to brush aside
to turn a blind eye to/to ignore
lit. to push the boat with the current/fig. to take advantage of the situation for one's own benefit
to turn a blind eye to
to dismiss with a laugh/to make light of
delighted to (do sth, idiom)/perfectly happy to do/most willing to do
(reduplicated) whether... or.../never mind/fine (indicating acceptance or resignation)

used in expressions of the form 照□不誤|照□不误[zhao4 xx5 bu4 wu4], in which □ is a verb, 照[zhao4] means "as before", and the overall meaning is "carry on (doing sth) regardless" or "continue (to do sth) in spite of changed circumstances", e.g. 照買不誤|照买不误[zhao4 mai3 bu4 wu4], to keep on buying (a product) regardless (of price hikes)
